Unitiger

noun | uni·tiger | \ˈyü-nə-,tī-gər\

  1. A creative professional that works in the print, web design, and web developemnt fields.
  2. A badass Unicorn.

Featured Project

EverBank Loan Officer website

I was given the task of enhancing the user experience for the EverBank Loan Officer websites. The goal of the project was to get more new loan conversions and make it easier for existing customers to check on their loan status. The project was driven by web analytics, Loan Officer and client feedback.
